body.p: At a meeting of the Board of Trustees of Albany Kentucky at D. R. Carr & Co's Store on the 15th June 1865. Present,

J. A. Brents chm
Wm Perkins
D R Carr
On Motion of Wm Huff & Wm B Wright of the style of Huff & Wright.

It is ordered that they be & they are hereby permitted to keep a coffee house in the house they now occupy, in the S. E. Corner of the Dabney Row, with the privilege of retailing wine whiskey Brandy & other Spirituous Liquors for Twelve month commencing to day. Whereupon they paid to the Treasurer the Town Tax of Seventy five dollars & Ten dollars State Tax, & Executed bond as required by the Statutes and the by laws of the Town.
A Copy Attest J. M. Buston Clk B. T.
At a meeting of the Board of trustees of the Town of Albany Ky at Perkins & Sproud's Store on the 28th day of November 1865, Presents
J. A. Brents, Wm Perkins, Thos Riley D. R. Carr.

On Motion of Milton Harvey & Huff & Wright It is ordered that the License obtained by Huff & Wright June 15th 1865 be & are hereby transferred to the said Harvey on the Condition that the said Harvey obligate himself to comply with the same Rules governing Huff & Wright and that Said Harvey have the benefit of the unexposed time of said License

Att D. R. Carr Clk J.A. Brents Chrm
A Copy Attest J. M Bristow Clk B. T.
